name: darwinism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the theories of Charles Darwin, which describe how animals and plants change and develop over millions of years, with those that are best suited to their environment being the most successful and others that are less well suited not continuing to exist: Some Christians opposed the teaching of Darwinism and evolution.
often disapproving a theory or system in which it is believed that the best people, businesses, etc. will be successful, while those that are not successful should be allowed to fail without being helped: The ideas of social Darwinism and eugenics were gradually discredited. This is a frightening sort of educational Darwinism in which the nation is failing children who need the most help.
More examplesFewer examplesCreation by God was the generally accepted explanation of the origin of life until the advent of Darwinism. Stalin rejected Darwinism in 1906, when he wrote a pamphlet arguing for the theories of Lamarck."There is nothing wrong with adapting to market conditions - it's just entrepreneurial Darwinism," he said.
